entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
